horizontal.desc: Make virtual list work in horizontal mode

virtual-list-slice-size.desc: Number of options to render in the virtual list

virtual-list-item-default-size.desc: Default size of an option (height or width for horizontal mode), in px - will be used for rendering the initial list. Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item.

scrollTo.desc: Scroll the list to the item with the specified index (0 based)

index.desc: The index of the list item (0 based)

scrollUp.desc: Specify if the list scrolls up

scroll.desc: Emitted when the virtual list scrolls

index.desc: Index of the list item that was scrolled into view (0 based)
